title: Support Chat asks for problem description, but only accepts 38 characters
body: When initiating a chat session, the page asks you to let the operator know what the issue is and provides a virtually limitless text field.  There is no indication that the text field will only transmit the first 38 characters to the support technician, but that apparently is the limit.

comments.body:
If there's a limited number of characters that can be entered this should be clearly indicated- especially if it's low.
It should also not be possible to enter more characters than will be submitted.
